name: dlang.org
description: Official website for D.

name: wiki.dlang.org
description: Official Wiki for D.

name: code.dlang.org
description: Offical Library/Module Registry for D.

name: Github Organization
description: Official GitHub organization for D. Repo for all official D tools & code.

name: forum.dlang.org
description: Official forum. Many interesting discussions occurring on a daily basis.

name: blog.dlang.org
description: Official blog.

name: Language Specification
description: D programming language specification.

name: Issue tracking
description: Official issue tracking/reporting system for D. If you find bugs in the D compiler and/or libraries, please come and report them!

name: Official D Forum Learn Group
description: Highest traffic site for answering D questions.

name: D on Stack Overflow
description: Less traffic than forums but possibly easier to search.

name: D on Rosetta Code
description: Examples of how to do many basic things in D.

name: Walter Bright
description: Father of D. Walter Bright is the creator and first implementer of the D programming language and has implemented compilers for several other languages.

name: Andrei Alexandrescu, PhD
description: C++ guru. Author of The D Programming Language and Modern C++ Design. With Walter Bright, Andrei co-designed many important features of D and authored a large part of D's standard library. Andrei works as a trainer in advanced C++ programming and algorithms and is now actively evangelizing D in the organization.

name: DConf
description: the premier event where D luminaries exchange knowledge, insight, and inspiration on everything related to the D language and its ecosystem.

name: D Programming Language
description: Official Organization, hosts DMD, Phobos and other official tools and libs.

name: LDC Developers
description: LDC releated projects.

name: DerelictOrg
description: A GitHub organization hosting all Derelict bindings including OpenGL and other multimedia/game related library bindings. (OpenGL 3, Bgfx, ENet,  SDL 2, GLFW 3，OpenGLES, Free Image, Assimp3, libtheora, libogg, libvorbis, SFML 2, libpq, PhysicsFS, Open Dynamics Engine, Lua, DevIL, OpenAL, ALURE).

name: DlangScience -A focal point and first port of call for scientific libraries and tooling for D.
Circular Studios
description: We are a group of game developers at Rochester Institute of Technology building games and game tech. Hosts Dash, a 3D game engine written in D, and other related libs.

name: d-gamedev-team
description: An organization of gamedev related repos, including a D gamedev toolkit called gfm and an opengl tutorial in D.

name: EMSI
description: A Career building company that uses D as their main language. Hosts their opensource projects.

name: infognition
description: Infognition is a self-funded and self-sustained company specializing in video processing and compression technologies for end-users and developers. They provide several opensource video related applications & tools written in D, hosted on bitbucket. They are also porting their main product--Video Enchanser from C/C++ to D.

name: libmir
description: D's numeric library development team

name: sociomantic labs
description: Berlin based company specializing in real-time bidding for online advertising. Main sponsor of the annual D language conference. Has open-sourced large parts of their codebase as part of the tsunami organization.

name: TDPL
description: The D Programming Language by Andrei Alexandrescu.

name: Programming in D
description: A very detailed book about programming in D by Ali Çehreli  covering many areas of the language. Has a free online version and is suitable for beginners.

name: D Cookbook
description: A recipe-packed reference guide filled with practical tasks that are concisely explained to develop and broaden the user's abilities with the D programming language. by Adam D. Ruppe. Here is an interesting review of the book.

name: Learning D
description: This book is intended for those with some background in a C-family language who want to learn how to apply their knowledge and experience to D. (...) This book will help you get up to speed with the language and avoid common pitfalls that arise when translating C-family experience to D.

name: D Web Development
description: Whether you are new to the world of D, or already have developed applications in D, or if you want to leverage the power of D for web development, then this book is ideal for you.

name: The Dlang Tour
description: An interactive tutorial for D, inspired by Golang Tour.

name: Pragmatic D tutorial
description: This is a pragmatic introduction to the D Programming Language. by Andreas Zwinkau.

name: D Template Tutorial
description: A tutorial dedicated to D Templates. Very good explanation about templates. Has pdf version. by Philippe Sigaud.

name: Component programming in D
description: An article written by Walter Bright that details how D's functional support leads to a flexible and beautiful component programming style.

name: Component programming with ranges
description: A detailed blog post about how to do component programming in a idiomatic D way with ranges, with a full working example.

name: Functional image processing in D
description: A very interesting tutorial about writing an image processing lib in D. Shows the power of D's templates/CTFE/Ranges/UFCS for functional style programming.

name: OpenGL tutorials
description: OpenGL tutorials in D.

name: D Bare bones
description: kernel hello world in D (using GDC compiler)

name: D barebone with ldc2
description: another kernel hello world in D (using LDC compiler)

name: XOmB bare bones
description: an exokernel operating system written in D. Main page, github.

name: Bare Metal ARM Cortex-M GDC Cross Compiler
description: building a bare metal ARM Cortex-M (arm-none-eabi) GDC cross compiler for a Linux host.

name: blog.dlang.org
description: Official blog.

name: /r/d_language on Reddit
description: A feed of news and blog posts about D.

name: This week in D
description: A weekly overview of activity in the D community and brief advice columns to help you get the most out of the D Programming Language.

name: Planet D
description: A repository of co-authored D-specific blogs maintained by Vladimir Panteleev.

name: D Idioms
description: A great blog for many useful idioms with D programming.

name: Purity in D
description: An article that explains the design principles behind D's purity feature.

name: Hidden treasures in the D standard library
description: An article talking about several useful functions and templates in Phobos.

name: Porting D Runtime to ARM
description: A study about porting a minimal D runtime to ARM Cortex-M preprocessors.

name: D is for Data Science
description: A great post about how D is suitable for data science, particularly, replacing the role of python scripts for fast prototyping.

name: code.dlang.org
description: Official D library repository. Backed by dub.

name: dub
description: Official package and build management system for D.

name: dmd
description: The reference compiler for the D programming language. Stable, builds insanely fast, very good for learning and rapid prototyping/development. Currently the frontend is implemented in D, and shared between dmd, ldc and gdc, the backend is implemented in C++.

name: ldc
description: The LLVM-based D compiler. Uses the DMD frontend and LLVM backend. Builds slower than dmd, but generates more optimized code than DMD. It supports all the target platforms of LLVM.

name: gdc
description: GNU D Compiler. Use DMD frontend and GCC backend. Currently targets the most platforms due to the use of GCC. Generated code runs faster than DMD in most cases, on par with LDC. In the process of integration with the official GCC toolchain.

name: sdc
description: The Stupid D Compiler. Written in D. Grows Smarter every day.

name: dil
description: A compiler for the D programming language. Written in D.

name: dub
description: De facto official package and build management system for D. Will be included officially soon.

name: scons-d
description: Scons has built-in support for building D projects, thanks to Russel Winder.

name: premake
description: Premake has built-in support for D projects

name: reggae
description: meta build system in D

name: Makefile
description: Makefile template for D projects

name: cmake-d
description: CMake D Projects

name: cook2
description: Fast incremental build tool intended for projects in D

name: button
description: A universal build system to build your software at the push of a button.

name: wild
description: Wild build system, used to build the PowerNex kernel

name: Mono-D
description: A D language addon for Xamarin Studio/MonoDevelop. With dub support.

name: Visual D
description: Visual Studio extension for the D programming language.

name: DDT
description: Eclipse plugin for the D programming language.

name: DCD
description: Independent auto-complete program for the D programming language. Could be used with editors like vim, emacs, sublime text, textadept, and zeus. See editors support.

name: Coedit
description: IDE for the D programming language, its compilers, tools and libraries.

name: Dlang IDE
description: D language IDE based on DlangUI. This is a pure D implementation.

name: libdparse
description: A D language lexer and parser, (possibly) future standard D parser/lexer.

name: Martin Nowak's Lexer
description: A lexer generator.

name: Mono-D's DParser
description: A D parser written in C# and used in Mono-D.

name: Pegged
description: A Parsing Expression Grammar (PEG) module written in D.

name: Goldie
description: Goldie Parsing System.

name: ctpg
description: Compile-Time Parser (with converter) Generator written in D.

name: dunnart
description: LALR(1) Parser Generator written in D.

name: warp
description: A fast preprocessor for C and C++ used in Facebook infrastructure. Written by Walter Bright.

name: higgs
description: Higgs JavaScript Virtual Machine, implemented in D.

name: EMSI containers
description: Containers that do not use the GC

name: memutils
description: Overhead allocators, allocator-aware containers and lifetime management for D objects

name: dlib.container
description: generic data structures (GC-free dynamic and associative arrays and more)

name: std.rcstring
description: A reference counted string implementation for D's build in string construct

name: libasync
description: Cross-platform event loop library of asynchronous objects

name: libhttp2
description: HTTP/2 library in D, translated from nghttp2

name: collie
description: An asynchronous event-driven network framework written in dlang, like netty framework in D.

name: Hunt
description: Hunt is a high-level D Programming Language Web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design. It lets you build high-performance Web applications quickly and easily.

name: vibe.d
description: Asynchronous I/O Web Framework that doesn’t get in your way, written in D.

name: arsd
description: Adam D. Ruppe's web framework.

name: cmsed
description: A component library for Vibe that functions as a CMS.

name: Diamond
description: Full-stack web-framework based on vibe.d, targetting enterprise development and high-performance web solutions for both small and big projects.

name: kissrpc
description: Fast and light, flatbuffers based rpc framework.

name: Hprose
description: A very newbility RPC Library for D, and it support 25+ languages now.

name: flatbuffers
description: D Programming Language implementation of the google flatbuffers library.

name: cerealed
description: Serialisation library for D

name: dproto
description: Google Protocol Buffer support in D.

name: vibe.data.json
description: JSON functions in Vibe.d. Currently the best implementation I used.

name: fast.json
description: A library for D that aims to provide the fastest possible implementation of some every day routines.

name: std.json
description: D's standard library JSON module. Needs refinement.

name: painlessjson
description: Convert between D types and std.json.

name: std.data.json
description: Phobos candidate for JSON serialization (based on Vibed)

name: asdf
description: Cache oriented string based JSON representation for fast read & writes and serialisatoin.

name: orange
description: General purpose serializer (currently only supports XML)

name: std.experimental.xml
description: Phobos candidate for a XML serialization

name: entity
description: Entity is an object-relational mapping tool for the D programming language. Referring to the design idea of JPA, support PostgreSQL / MySQL / SQLite.

name: dbal
description: Database Abstraction Layer for dlang, can construct SQL statements.

name: database
description: Database abstraction layer for D programing language, support PostgreSQL / MySQL / SQLite.

name: vibe.d
description: Vibe.d has internal support for Redis and MongoDB, which are very stable. Soon, the database drivers will be separated into independent projects.

name: mysql-native
description: A MySQL client implemented in native D.

name: ddb
description: Database access for D2. Currently only supports PostgreSQL.

name: arsd
description: Adam D. Ruppe's library; in addition to a Web backend, it also has support for database access with database.d, sqlite.d, mysql.d and postgres.d.

name: ddbc
description: DDBC is a DB Connector for D language (similar to JDBC). HibernateD (see below) uses ddbc for database abstraction.

name: hibernated
description: HibernateD is an ORM for D (similar to Hibernate).

name: dvorm
description: An ORM for D with Vibe support. Works with vibe.d and mysql-d, giving it the ability to access MongoDB and MySQL.

name: Tiny Redis
description: Redis driver for D. Fast, Simple, Stable. Has no dependencies.

name: tilix
description: A tiling terminal emulator for Linux using GTK+ 3.

name: scriptlike
description: Utility library to aid writing script-like programs in D.

name: todod
description: Todod is a command line based todo list manager. It also has support for shell interaction based on linenoise.

name: d-colorize
description: A port of the ruby library colorize. It add some methods to set color, background color and text effect on console easier using ANSI escape sequences.

name: terminal.d
description: Part of Adam Ruppe's arsd library supporting cursor and color manipulation on the console.

name: dexpect
description: A D implementation of the expect framework. Handy for bash emulation.

name: Argon
description: A processor for command-line arguments, an alternative to Getopt, written in D.

name: argsd
description: A command line and config file parser for DLang

name: DLangUI
description: Cross Platform GUI for D programming language. My personal favorate, because it is written in D(not a binding), and is cross platform. DLangUI also has a good showcase in the IDE DLangIDE.

name: GtkD
description: GtkD is a D binding and OO wrapper of GTK+. GtkD is actively maintained and is currently the most stable GUI lib for D.

name: DWT
description: A library for creating cross-platform GUI applications. GWT is a port of the Java SWT library to D. DWT was promoted as a semi-standard GUI library for D, but unfortunately didn't catch up popularity yet.

name: tkD
description: GUI toolkit for the D programming language based on Tcl/Tk.

name: dqml
description: Qt Qml bindings for the D programming language.

name: Sciter-Dport
description: D bindings for the Sciter - crossplatform HTML/CSS/script desktop UI toolkit.

name: LibUI
description: Dynamic Binding for libui

name: PowerNex
description: A kernel written in D

name: Trinix
description: Hybrid operating system for x64 PC written in D

name: XOmB
description: An exokernel operating system written in D

name: DerelictOrg
description: A GitHub organization hosting all Derelict bindings including:

name: DGame
description: A 2D framework for the D programming Language. see http://dgame-dev.de/.

name: gfm
description: D gamedev toolkit. see http://d-gamedev-team.github.io/gfm/.

name: Dash
description: A free and open 3D game engine written in D. see http://circularstudios.com/dash.

name: DSFML
description: A static binding of SFML in a way that makes sense for D. see http://dsfml.com/.

name: DAllegro5
description: D binding/wrapper to Allegro 5, a modern game programming library.

name: Voxelman
description: Plugin-based client-server voxel game engine written in D language

name: Spacecraft
description: A 3d multiplayer deathmatch space game written in D 2.0.

name: Dtanks
description: Robot Tank Battle Game.

name: [Atrium] (https://github.com/gecko0307/atrium)
description: FPS game with physics based puzzles using OpenGL.

name: DerelictGL3
description: A dynamic binding to OpenGL for the D Programming Language.

name: ArmageddonEngine
description: Vladimir Panteleev's ae library has a package for image processing in functional style, which is described in the article Functional Image Processing in D.

name: Blogsort
description: A simple Windows app for viewing photos and preparing them for a blog.

name: dlib.image
description: image processing (8 and 16 bits per channel, floating point operations, filtering, FFT, HDRI, graphics formats support including JPEG and PNG)

name: color.d + bmp.d, jpg.d, png.d
description: basic color struct, HSL functions and reading and writing image files

name: vectorflow
description: Nexflix's opensource deep learning framework.

name: DCompute
description: GPGPU with Native D for OpenCL and CUDA

name: DerelictCUDA
description: Dynamic bindings to the CUDA library for the D Programming Language.

name: DerelictCL
description: Dynamic bindings to the OpenCL library for the D Programming Language.

name: scid
description: Scientific library for the D programming language

name: dstats
description: A statistics library for D.

name: mir
description: Sandbox for some mir packages: sparse tensors, Hoffman and others.

name: mir-algorithm
description: N-dimensional arrays (matrixes, tensors), algorithms, general purpose library.

name: mir-random
description: Advanced Random Number Generators.

name: decimals
description: Decimal library for D.

name: eBay's TSV utilities
description: Command line tools for large delimited data files. Filtering, statistics, sampling, joins and more. Very fast.

name: std.experimenatal.logger
description: Phobos's upcoming standard logging facility

name: dlogg
description: Logging for concurrent applications and daemons with lazy and delayed logging, logrotate support.

name: sdlang
description: An SDL (Simple Declarative Language) library for D.

name: D:YAML
description: YAML parser and emitter for the D programming language.

name: inifile-D
description: A compile time ini file parser and writter generator for D

name: mood
description: simple vibe.d based blog engine

name: dunit
description: Advanced unit testing & mocking toolkit

name: unit-threaded
description: Multi-threaded unit test framework
